attributes.action: help the unemployed and the homeless
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: with the economy as it is, unemplyment rising, and the houseing market in crash, now would be an excellent time for the government to kill two birds with one stone, help us the hundreds of thousands out of work and WILLING to work build council style housing, as payment give us a stake in the property. rent will go to the government, people will have work, and people will have houses,
